snippet.title: LET IT BLEED | What Happens When an Ordinary Man Pushes Back? | Full Movie
snippet.description:
One decision pulls an ordinary man into a dangerous world.
Surviving the fallout becomes his only option.

After taking matters into his own hands, an otherwise ordinary man finds himself caught in a conflict far bigger than he expected. His actions draw the attention of a powerful crime figure, placing him in constant danger. As pressure mounts, he must stay one step ahead while facing the consequences of the choice that changed his life.

Director: Ben Burke
Cast: Mike Pfaff, Shannon Lorance, Bradley Fisher.
© Published under license.
#LetItBleed #FullMovie #ActionThriller #Crime #Suspense
